messages.subject: Re: Heading to Chicago
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Ren, I m new to the list and haven t posted an intro or anything yet.... We live in NW Indiana and will be at the InHome conference.  I know a few other
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@...> wrote:
>
> I'll be flying into Chicago on Thursday March 6th to speak at the
> annual In-Home conference (http://www.homeeducatorsconference.org/)on
> the 7th and 8th. Anyone on this list attending? I know a couple are
> that wrote me offlist but I was wondering about anyone else.
>
> If you're going to be in the Chicago area that day, my flight gets in
> around noon and I don't have to be out to the hotel until evening if
> you feel like goofing off! Write me.:)
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com
>
Hi Ren,
I'm new to the list and haven't posted an intro or anything yet.... We
live in NW Indiana and will be at the InHome conference. I know a few
other local unschooling families who will be attending as well. What
are you looking to do?? Is your family traveling with you?
I have 4 children - dd13, ds12, ds10, and ds4. We have been
homeschooling off and on for over 5 years and finally got it right and
took Spring Break last year and moved on to unschooling as a more
permanent answer as we were not very good at public schooling!!
Sometimes, I'm just a slow learner.... <BWG>
Anyhow, look forward to meeting you at the conference or before.
Donna

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Heading to Chicago
messages.msgSnippet: I will be there!  I actually came back here to lurk after being away for a bit because I saw that you were presenting at the conference.   Is your whole family
messages.messageBody:
I will be there! I actually came back here to lurk
after being away for a bit because I saw that you were
presenting at the conference. Is your whole family
attending or just you (nosey minds want to know!)

I cant wait!

Chrissy

messages.subject: Heading to Chicago
messages.msgSnippet: I ll be flying into Chicago on Thursday March 6th to speak at the annual In-Home conference (http://www.homeeducatorsconference.org/)on the 7th and 8th. Anyone
messages.messageBody:
I'll be flying into Chicago on Thursday March 6th to speak at the
annual In-Home conference (http://www.homeeducatorsconference.org/)on
the 7th and 8th. Anyone on this list attending? I know a couple are
that wrote me offlist but I was wondering about anyone else.

If you're going to be in the Chicago area that day, my flight gets in
around noon and I don't have to be out to the hotel until evening if
you feel like goofing off! Write me.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
